seacondition module¶

class seacondition.Airywave(waveHeight=1.0, waveLength=25.0, waterDepth=60.0)¶

Bases: object

Using Airy wave theory

To define this class, need to import:

wave height [m], wavelength [m], wave period [s], water depth [m]

in this library, I assume the wave is coming from -X, and long X-axis, Z is the gravity direction,Z=0 iz the water level, and the water is below z=0 If there are any questions, please contact hui.cheng@uis.no

get_velocity_at_elements(position_nodes, elements, global_time)¶
Parameters

  • position_nodes – a numpy list of position

  • elements – a python list of element

Returns

Get a numpy array of velocity at a list of elements
